post.body: ok i guess. still leaning towards asthma cuz there's no sign on bronchitis or pnemonia
happy birthday!!!! and CHEER UP!
me too!! love the cd.
watching the Lion King with Liam and boy oh boy does it make me feel like a kid again. i loved this movie!
finally getting a chance to relax with liam and just play with his new toys!
ok finally taking liam for his chest xray
soooo full from dinner @ gram's. now getting cozy and watching a movie.
nap with liam, then taking him for his chest xray, then gramma sally's for dinner with all the family! yay!
just got back from taking liam to see Bolt. his first movie in the theater ever and he LOVED it. he did SO good!!!
omgosh this present unwrapping is taking FOREVER! he's still going lol
my back is effing killing me from wrapping gifts! dreading wrapping the shit ton of stuff i have to liam tonight.
poor liam has to go for a chest xray friday. doctor thinks he has asthma :( my poor little baby.
appointment at the plastic surgeon today for my scar from the accident. hopefully she writes that it's horrible so i can get lots of money!
home from work right into bed. don't want to get up but i need to take a shower and wrap teacher gifts. grrr.
babysitting Cami. such a cutie patootie! Liam and him are playing SO nice!
got knocked out my a dumpster door today. true story. my head is not gonna feel pretty in the morning.
so happy! thought i was working at 4 but nope it's 5 which means me and liam are taking naps!!
yay my driveway just got plowed! not that i'm going anywhere lol
oh boy here is comessss!!!
where the hell are you snow!? beef stew is in the oven and i'm looking forward to a VERY cozy night!
